alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:32PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Lucie, Indian River and southeastern Brevard Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 332 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wabasso, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Sebastian, Vero Beach, and Fellsmere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
